00083 /* This function is used to process the necessary updates for */
00084 void ED_armature_enter_posemode(bContext *C, Base *base)
00085 {
00086     ReportList *reports= CTX_wm_reports(C);
00087     Object *ob= base->object;
00088     
00089     if (ob->id.lib) {
00090         BKE_report(reports, RPT_WARNING, "Can't pose libdata");
00091         return;
00092     }
00093     
00094     switch (ob->type) {
00095         case OB_ARMATURE:
00096             ob->restore_mode = ob->mode;
00097             ob->mode |= OB_MODE_POSE;
00098             
00099             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MODE|NS_MODE_POSE, NULL);
00100             
00101             break;
00102         default:
00103             return;
00104     }
00105     
00106     // XXX: disabled as this would otherwise cause a nasty loop...
00107     //ED_object_toggle_modes(C, ob->mode);
00108 }
00109 
00110 void ED_armature_exit_posemode(bContext *C, Base *base)
00111 {
00112     if (base) {
00113         Object *ob= base->object;
00114         
00115         ob->restore_mode = ob->mode;
00116         ob->mode &= ~OB_MODE_POSE;
00117         
00118         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MODE|NS_MODE_OBJECT, NULL);
00119     }   
00120 }

00122 /* if a selected or active bone is protected, throw error (oonly if warn==1) and return 1 */
00123 /* only_selected==1 : the active bone is allowed to be protected */
00124 #if 0 /* UNUSED 2.5 */
00125 static short pose_has_protected_selected(Object *ob, short warn)
00126 {
00127     /* check protection */
00128     if (ob->proxy) {
00129         bPoseChannel *pchan;
00130         bArmature *arm= ob->data;
00131 
00132         for (pchan= ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
00133             if (pchan->bone && (pchan->bone->layer & arm->layer)) {
00134                 if (pchan->bone->layer & arm->layer_protected) {
00135                     if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED)
00136                        break;
00137                 }
00138             }
00139         }
00140         if (pchan) {
00141             if (warn) error("Cannot change Proxy protected bones");
00142             return 1;
00143         }
00144     }
00145     return 0;
00146 }
00147 #endif

00149 /* only for real IK, not for auto-IK */
00150 static int pose_channel_in_IK_chain(Object *ob, bPoseChannel *pchan, int level)
00151 {
00152     bConstraint *con;
00153     Bone *bone;
00154     
00155     /* No need to check if constraint is active (has influence),
00156      * since all constraints with CONSTRAINT_IK_AUTO are active */
00157     for (con= pchan->constraints.first; con; con= con->next) {
00158         if (con->type==CONSTRAINT_TYPE_KINEMATIC) {
00159             bKinematicConstraint *data= con->data;
00160             if (data->rootbone == 0 || data->rootbone > level) {
00161                 if ((data->flag & CONSTRAINT_IK_AUTO)==0)
00162                     return 1;
00163             }
00164         }
00165     }
00166     for (bone= pchan->bone->childbase.first; bone; bone= bone->next) {
00167         pchan= get_pose_channel(ob->pose, bone->name);
00168         if (pchan && pose_channel_in_IK_chain(ob, pchan, level + 1))
00169             return 1;
00170     }
00171     return 0;
00172 }
00173 
00174 int ED_pose_channel_in_IK_chain(Object *ob, bPoseChannel *pchan)
00175 {
00176     return pose_channel_in_IK_chain(ob, pchan, 0);
00177 }

00179 /* ********************************************** */
00180 /* Motion Paths */
00181 
00182 /* For the object with pose/action: update paths for those that have got them
00183  * This should selectively update paths that exist...
00184  *
00185  * To be called from various tools that do incremental updates 
00186  */
00187 void ED_pose_recalculate_paths(Scene *scene, Object *ob)
00188 {
00189     ListBase targets = {NULL, NULL};
00190     
00191     /* set flag to force recalc, then grab the relevant bones to target */
00192     ob->pose->avs.recalc |= ANIMVIZ_RECALC_PATHS;
00193     animviz_get_object_motionpaths(ob, &targets);
00194     
00195     /* recalculate paths, then free */
00196     animviz_calc_motionpaths(scene, &targets);
00197     BLI_freelistN(&targets);
00198 }
00199 
00200 /* For the object with pose/action: create path curves for selected bones 
00201  * This recalculates the WHOLE path within the pchan->pathsf and pchan->pathef range
00202  */
00203 static int pose_calculate_paths_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00204 {
00205     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00206     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00207     Object *ob;
00208     
00209     /* since this call may also be used from the buttons window, we need to check for where to get the object */
00210     if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_BUTS) 
00211         ob= ED_object_context(C);
00212     else
00213         ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
00214         
00215     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->pose))
00216         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00217     
00218     /* set up path data for bones being calculated */
00219     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel*, pchan, selected_pose_bones) 
00220     {
00221         /* verify makes sure that the selected bone has a bone with the appropriate settings */
00222         animviz_verify_motionpaths(op->reports, scene, ob, pchan);
00223     }
00224     CTX_DATA_END;
00225     
00226     /* calculate the bones that now have motionpaths... */
00227     // TODO: only make for the selected bones?
00228     ED_pose_recalculate_paths(scene, ob);
00229     
00230     /* notifiers for updates */
00231     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
00232     
00233     return OPERATOR_FINISHED; 
00234 }

00236 void POSE_OT_paths_calculate (wmOperatorType *ot)
00237 {
00238     /* identifiers */
00239     ot->name = "Calculate Bone Paths";
00240     ot->idname = "POSE_OT_paths_calculate";
00241     ot->description = "Calculate paths for the selected bones";
00242     
00243     /* api callbacks */
00244     ot->exec = pose_calculate_paths_exec;
00245     ot->poll = ED_operator_posemode;
00246     
00247     /* flags */
00248     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00249 }

00253 /* for the object with pose/action: clear path curves for selected bones only */
00254 static void ED_pose_clear_paths(Object *ob)
00255 {
00256     bPoseChannel *pchan;
00257     short skipped = 0;
00258     
00259     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->pose))
00260         return;
00261     
00262     /* free the motionpath blocks, but also take note of whether we skipped some... */
00263     for (pchan= ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
00264         if (pchan->mpath) {
00265             if ((pchan->bone) && (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED)) {
00266                 animviz_free_motionpath(pchan->mpath);
00267                 pchan->mpath= NULL;
00268             }
00269             else 
00270                 skipped = 1;
00271         }
00272     }
00273     
00274     /* if we didn't skip any, we shouldn't have any paths left */
00275     if (skipped == 0)
00276         ob->pose->avs.path_bakeflag &= ~MOTIONPATH_BAKE_HAS_PATHS;
00277 }
00278 
00279 /* operator callback for this */
00280 static int pose_clear_paths_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00281 {
00282     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00283     Object *ob;
00284     
00285     /* since this call may also be used from the buttons window, we need to check for where to get the object */
00286     if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_BUTS) 
00287         ob= ED_object_context(C);
00288     else
00289         ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
00290         
00291     /* only continue if there's an object */
00292     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->pose))
00293         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00294     
00295     /* use the backend function for this */
00296     ED_pose_clear_paths(ob);
00297     
00298     /* notifiers for updates */
00299     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
00300     
00301     return OPERATOR_FINISHED; 
00302 }

00319 /* ******************* Select Constraint Target Operator ************* */
00320 
00321 static int pose_select_constraint_target_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00322 {
00323     Object *ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
00324     bConstraint *con;
00325     int found= 0;
00326     
00327     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel *, pchan, visible_pose_bones) 
00328     {
00329         if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00330             for (con= pchan->constraints.first; con; con= con->next) {
00331                 bConstraintTypeInfo *cti= constraint_get_typeinfo(con);
00332                 ListBase targets = {NULL, NULL};
00333                 bConstraintTarget *ct;
00334                 
00335                 if (cti && cti->get_constraint_targets) {
00336                     cti->get_constraint_targets(con, &targets);
00337                     
00338                     for (ct= targets.first; ct; ct= ct->next) {
00339                         if ((ct->tar == ob) && (ct->subtarget[0])) {
00340                             bPoseChannel *pchanc= get_pose_channel(ob->pose, ct->subtarget);
00341                             if ((pchanc) && !(pchanc->bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE)) {
00342                                 pchanc->bone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED|BONE_TIPSEL|BONE_ROOTSEL;
00343                                 found= 1;
00344                             }
00345                         }
00346                     }
00347                     
00348                     if (cti->flush_constraint_targets)
00349                         cti->flush_constraint_targets(con, &targets, 1);
00350                 }
00351             }
00352         }
00353     }
00354     CTX_DATA_END;
00355 
00356     if (!found)
00357         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00358 
00359     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_BONE_SELECT, ob);
00360 
00361     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00362 }
00363

00379 /* ******************* select hierarchy operator ************* */
00380 
00381 static int pose_select_hierarchy_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00382 {
00383     Object *ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
00384     bArmature *arm= ob->data;
00385     Bone *curbone, *pabone, *chbone;
00386     int direction = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "direction");
00387     int add_to_sel = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
00388     int found= 0;
00389     
00390     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel *, pchan, visible_pose_bones) 
00391     {
00392         curbone= pchan->bone;
00393         
00394         if ((curbone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE)==0) {
00395             if (curbone == arm->act_bone) {
00396                 if (direction == BONE_SELECT_PARENT) {
00397                     if (pchan->parent == NULL) continue;
00398                     else pabone= pchan->parent->bone;
00399                     
00400                     if (PBONE_VISIBLE(arm, pabone)) {
00401                         if (!add_to_sel) curbone->flag &= ~BONE_SELECTED;
00402                         pabone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
00403                         arm->act_bone= pabone;
00404                         
00405                         found= 1;
00406                         break;
00407                     }
00408                 } 
00409                 else { /* direction == BONE_SELECT_CHILD */
00410 
00411                     /* the child member is only assigned to connected bones, see [#30340] */
00412 #if 0
00413                     if (pchan->child == NULL) continue;
00414                     else chbone = pchan->child->bone;
00415 #else
00416                     /* instead. find _any_ visible child bone, using the first one is a little arbitrary  - campbell */
00417                     chbone = pchan->child ? pchan->child->bone : NULL;
00418                     if (chbone == NULL) {
00419                         bPoseChannel *pchan_child;
00420 
00421                         for (pchan_child = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan_child; pchan_child = pchan_child->next) {
00422                             /* possible we have multiple children, some invisible */
00423                             if (PBONE_VISIBLE(arm, pchan_child->bone)) {
00424                                 if (pchan_child->parent == pchan) {
00425                                     chbone = pchan_child->bone;
00426                                     break;
00427                                 }
00428                             }
00429                         }
00430                     }
00431 
00432                     if (chbone == NULL) continue;
00433 #endif
00434                     
00435                     if (PBONE_VISIBLE(arm, chbone)) {
00436                         if (!add_to_sel) curbone->flag &= ~BONE_SELECTED;
00437                         chbone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
00438                         arm->act_bone= chbone;
00439                         
00440                         found= 1;
00441                         break;
00442                     }
00443                 }
00444             }
00445         }
00446     }
00447     CTX_DATA_END;
00448 
00449     if (found == 0)
00450         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00451 
00452     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_BONE_SELECT, ob);
00453 
00454     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00455 }

00457 void POSE_OT_select_hierarchy(wmOperatorType *ot)
00458 {
00459     static EnumPropertyItem direction_items[]= {
00460         {BONE_SELECT_PARENT, "PARENT", 0, "Select Parent", ""},
00461         {BONE_SELECT_CHILD, "CHILD", 0, "Select Child", ""},
00462         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00463     };
00464     
00465     /* identifiers */
00466     ot->name = "Select Hierarchy";
00467     ot->idname = "POSE_OT_select_hierarchy";
00468     ot->description = "Select immediate parent/children of selected bones";
00469     
00470     /* api callbacks */
00471     ot->exec = pose_select_hierarchy_exec;
00472     ot->poll = ED_operator_posemode;
00473     
00474     /* flags */
00475     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00476     
00477     /* props */
00478     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "direction", direction_items, BONE_SELECT_PARENT, "Direction", "");
00479     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0, "Add to Selection", "");
00480     
00481 }

00483 /* ******************* select grouped operator ************* */
00484 
00485 static short pose_select_same_group (bContext *C, Object *ob, short extend)
00486 {
00487     bArmature *arm= (ob)? ob->data : NULL;
00488     bPose *pose= (ob)? ob->pose : NULL;
00489     char *group_flags;
00490     int numGroups = 0;
00491     short changed=0, tagged=0;
00492     
00493     /* sanity checks */
00494     if (ELEM3(NULL, ob, pose, arm))
00495         return 0;
00496         
00497     /* count the number of groups */
00498     numGroups= BLI_countlist(&pose->agroups);
00499     if (numGroups == 0)
00500         return 0;
00501         
00502     /* alloc a small array to keep track of the groups to use 
00503      *  - each cell stores on/off state for whether group should be used
00504      *  - size is numGroups + 1, since index=0 is used for no-group
00505      */
00506     group_flags= MEM_callocN(numGroups+1, "pose_select_same_group");
00507     
00508     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel *, pchan, visible_pose_bones) 
00509     {
00510         /* keep track of group as group to use later? */
00511         if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00512             group_flags[pchan->agrp_index] = 1;
00513             tagged= 1;
00514         }
00515         
00516         /* deselect all bones before selecting new ones? */
00517         if ((extend == 0) && (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE)==0)
00518             pchan->bone->flag &= ~BONE_SELECTED;
00519     }
00520     CTX_DATA_END;
00521     
00522     /* small optimization: only loop through bones a second time if there are any groups tagged */
00523     if (tagged) {
00524         /* only if group matches (and is not selected or current bone) */
00525         CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel *, pchan, visible_pose_bones) 
00526         {
00527             if ((pchan->bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE)==0) {
00528                 /* check if the group used by this bone is counted */
00529                 if (group_flags[pchan->agrp_index]) {
00530                     pchan->bone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
00531                     changed= 1;
00532                 }
00533             }
00534         }
00535         CTX_DATA_END;
00536     }
00537     
00538     /* free temp info */
00539     MEM_freeN(group_flags);
00540     
00541     return changed;
00542 }
00543 
00544 static short pose_select_same_layer (bContext *C, Object *ob, short extend)
00545 {
00546     bPose *pose= (ob)? ob->pose : NULL;
00547     bArmature *arm= (ob)? ob->data : NULL;
00548     short changed= 0;
00549     int layers= 0;
00550     
00551     if (ELEM3(NULL, ob, pose, arm))
00552         return 0;
00553     
00554     /* figure out what bones are selected */
00555     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel *, pchan, visible_pose_bones) 
00556     {
00557         /* keep track of layers to use later? */
00558         if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED)
00559             layers |= pchan->bone->layer;
00560             
00561         /* deselect all bones before selecting new ones? */
00562         if ((extend == 0) && (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE)==0)
00563             pchan->bone->flag &= ~BONE_SELECTED;
00564     }
00565     CTX_DATA_END;
00566     if (layers == 0) 
00567         return 0;
00568         
00569     /* select bones that are on same layers as layers flag */
00570     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel *, pchan, visible_pose_bones) 
00571     {
00572         /* if bone is on a suitable layer, and the bone can have its selection changed, select it */
00573         if ((layers & pchan->bone->layer) && (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE)==0) {
00574             pchan->bone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
00575             changed= 1;
00576         }
00577     }
00578     CTX_DATA_END;
00579     
00580     return changed;
00581 }
00582 
00583 static int pose_select_same_keyingset(bContext *C, Object *ob, short extend)
00584 {
00585     KeyingSet *ks = ANIM_scene_get_active_keyingset(CTX_data_scene(C));
00586     KS_Path *ksp;
00587     
00588     bArmature *arm = (ob)? ob->data : NULL;
00589     bPose *pose= (ob)? ob->pose : NULL;
00590     short changed= 0;
00591     
00592     /* sanity checks: validate Keying Set and object */
00593     if ((ks == NULL) || (ANIM_validate_keyingset(C, NULL, ks) != 0))
00594         return 0;
00595         
00596     if (ELEM3(NULL, ob, pose, arm))
00597         return 0;
00598         
00599     /* if not extending selection, deselect all selected first */
00600     if (extend == 0) {
00601         CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel *, pchan, visible_pose_bones) 
00602         {
00603             if ((pchan->bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE)==0)
00604                 pchan->bone->flag &= ~BONE_SELECTED;
00605         }
00606         CTX_DATA_END;
00607     }
00608         
00609     /* iterate over elements in the Keying Set, setting selection depending on whether 
00610      * that bone is visible or not...
00611      */
00612     for (ksp = ks->paths.first; ksp; ksp = ksp->next) {
00613         /* only items related to this object will be relevant */
00614         if ((ksp->id == &ob->id) && (ksp->rna_path != NULL)) {
00615             if (strstr(ksp->rna_path, "bones")) {
00616                 char *boneName = BLI_getQuotedStr(ksp->rna_path, "bones[");
00617                 
00618                 if (boneName) {
00619                     bPoseChannel *pchan = get_pose_channel(pose, boneName);
00620                     
00621                     if (pchan) {
00622                         /* select if bone is visible and can be affected */
00623                         if ((PBONE_VISIBLE(arm, pchan->bone)) && 
00624                             (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE)==0)
00625                         {
00626                             pchan->bone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
00627                             changed = 1;
00628                         }
00629                     }
00630                     
00631                     /* free temp memory */
00632                     MEM_freeN(boneName);
00633                 }
00634             }
00635         }
00636     }
00637     
00638     return changed;
00639 }
00640 
00641 static int pose_select_grouped_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00642 {
00643     Object *ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
00644     short extend= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
00645     short changed = 0;
00646     
00647     /* sanity check */
00648     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->pose))
00649         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00650         
00651     /* selection types 
00652      * NOTE: for the order of these, see the enum in POSE_OT_select_grouped()
00653      */
00654     switch (RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type")) {
00655         case 1: /* group */
00656             changed= pose_select_same_group(C, ob, extend);
00657             break;
00658         case 2: /* Keying Set */
00659             changed= pose_select_same_keyingset(C, ob, extend);
00660             break;
00661         default: /* layer */
00662             changed= pose_select_same_layer(C, ob, extend);
00663             break;
00664     }
00665     
00666     /* notifiers for updates */
00667     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
00668     
00669     /* report done status */
00670     if (changed)
00671         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00672     else
00673         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00674 }
00675 
00676 void POSE_OT_select_grouped (wmOperatorType *ot)
00677 {
00678     static EnumPropertyItem prop_select_grouped_types[] = {
00679         {0, "LAYER", 0, "Layer", "Shared layers"},
00680         {1, "GROUP", 0, "Group", "Shared group"},
00681         {2, "KEYINGSET", 0, "Keying Set", "All bones affected by active Keying Set"},
00682         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00683     };
00684 
00685     /* identifiers */
00686     ot->name = "Select Grouped";
00687     ot->description = "Select all visible bones grouped by similar properties";
00688     ot->idname = "POSE_OT_select_grouped";
00689     
00690     /* api callbacks */
00691     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
00692     ot->exec = pose_select_grouped_exec;
00693     ot->poll = ED_operator_posemode;
00694     
00695     /* flags */
00696     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00697     
00698     /* properties */
00699     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", FALSE, "Extend", "Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first");
00700     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", prop_select_grouped_types, 0, "Type", "");
00701 }

00704 /* ********************************************** */
00705 
00706 /* context active object, or weightpainted object with armature in posemode */
00707 static int pose_bone_flip_active_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00708 {
00709     Object *ob_act= CTX_data_active_object(C);
00710     Object *ob= object_pose_armature_get(ob_act);
00711 
00712     if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)) {
00713         bArmature *arm= ob->data;
00714 
00715         if (arm->act_bone) {
00716             bPoseChannel *pchanf;
00717             char name[MAXBONENAME];
00718             flip_side_name(name, arm->act_bone->name, TRUE);
00719 
00720             pchanf= get_pose_channel(ob->pose, name);
00721             if (pchanf && pchanf->bone != arm->act_bone) {
00722                 arm->act_bone->flag &= ~BONE_SELECTED;
00723                 pchanf->bone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
00724 
00725                 arm->act_bone= pchanf->bone;
00726 
00727                 /* in weightpaint we select the associated vertex group too */
00728                 if (ob_act->mode & OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT) {
00729                     ED_vgroup_select_by_name(ob_act, name);
00730                     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob_act->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00731                 }
00732 
00733                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_BONE_SELECT, ob);
00734 
00735                 return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00736             }
00737         }
00738     }
00739 
00740     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00741 }

00743 void POSE_OT_select_flip_active(wmOperatorType *ot)

00745     /* identifiers */
00746     ot->name = "Flip Selected Active Bone";
00747     ot->idname = "POSE_OT_select_flip_active";
00748     ot->description = "Activate the bone with a flipped name";
00749     
00750     /* api callbacks */
00751     ot->exec = pose_bone_flip_active_exec;
00752     ot->poll = ED_operator_posemode;
00753     
00754     /* flags */
00755     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00756 }

00760 #if 0 /* UNUSED 2.5 */
00761 static void pose_copy_menu(Scene *scene)
00762 {
00763     Object *obedit= scene->obedit; // XXX context
00764     Object *ob= OBACT;
00765     bArmature *arm;
00766     bPoseChannel *pchan, *pchanact;
00767     short nr=0;
00768     int i=0;
00769     
00770     /* paranoia checks */
00771     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->pose)) return;
00772     if ((ob==obedit) || (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)==0) return;
00773     
00774     pchan= get_active_posechannel(ob);
00775     
00776     if (pchan==NULL) return;
00777     pchanact= pchan;
00778     arm= ob->data;
00779 
00780     /* if proxy-protected bones selected, some things (such as locks + displays) shouldn't be changeable,
00781      * but for constraints (just add local constraints)
00782      */
00783     if (pose_has_protected_selected(ob, 0)) {
00784         i= BLI_countlist(&(pchanact->constraints)); /* if there are 24 or less, allow for the user to select constraints */
00785         if (i < 25)
00786             nr= pupmenu("Copy Pose Attributes %t|Local Location%x1|Local Rotation%x2|Local Size%x3|%l|Visual Location %x9|Visual Rotation%x10|Visual Size%x11|%l|Constraints (All)%x4|Constraints...%x5");
00787         else
00788             nr= pupmenu("Copy Pose Attributes %t|Local Location%x1|Local Rotation%x2|Local Size%x3|%l|Visual Location %x9|Visual Rotation%x10|Visual Size%x11|%l|Constraints (All)%x4");
00789     }
00790     else {
00791         i= BLI_countlist(&(pchanact->constraints)); /* if there are 24 or less, allow for the user to select constraints */
00792         if (i < 25)
00793             nr= pupmenu("Copy Pose Attributes %t|Local Location%x1|Local Rotation%x2|Local Size%x3|%l|Visual Location %x9|Visual Rotation%x10|Visual Size%x11|%l|Constraints (All)%x4|Constraints...%x5|%l|Transform Locks%x6|IK Limits%x7|Bone Shape%x8");
00794         else
00795             nr= pupmenu("Copy Pose Attributes %t|Local Location%x1|Local Rotation%x2|Local Size%x3|%l|Visual Location %x9|Visual Rotation%x10|Visual Size%x11|%l|Constraints (All)%x4|%l|Transform Locks%x6|IK Limits%x7|Bone Shape%x8");
00796     }
00797     
00798     if (nr <= 0) 
00799         return;
00800     
00801     if (nr != 5) {
00802         for (pchan= ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
00803             if ( (arm->layer & pchan->bone->layer) &&
00804                  (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) &&
00805                  (pchan != pchanact) ) 
00806             {
00807                 switch (nr) {
00808                     case 1: /* Local Location */
00809                         copy_v3_v3(pchan->loc, pchanact->loc);
00810                         break;
00811                     case 2: /* Local Rotation */
00812                         copy_qt_qt(pchan->quat, pchanact->quat);
00813                         copy_v3_v3(pchan->eul, pchanact->eul);
00814                         break;
00815                     case 3: /* Local Size */
00816                         copy_v3_v3(pchan->size, pchanact->size);
00817                         break;
00818                     case 4: /* All Constraints */
00819                     {
00820                         ListBase tmp_constraints = {NULL, NULL};
00821                         
00822                         /* copy constraints to tmpbase and apply 'local' tags before 
00823                          * appending to list of constraints for this channel
00824                          */
00825                         copy_constraints(&tmp_constraints, &pchanact->constraints, TRUE);
00826                         if ((ob->proxy) && (pchan->bone->layer & arm->layer_protected)) {
00827                             bConstraint *con;
00828                             
00829                             /* add proxy-local tags */
00830                             for (con= tmp_constraints.first; con; con= con->next)
00831                                 con->flag |= CONSTRAINT_PROXY_LOCAL;
00832                         }
00833                         BLI_movelisttolist(&pchan->constraints, &tmp_constraints);
00834                         
00835                         /* update flags (need to add here, not just copy) */
00836                         pchan->constflag |= pchanact->constflag;
00837                         
00838                         if (ob->pose)
00839                             ob->pose->flag |= POSE_RECALC;
00840                     }
00841                         break;
00842                     case 6: /* Transform Locks */
00843                         pchan->protectflag = pchanact->protectflag;
00844                         break;
00845                     case 7: /* IK (DOF) settings */
00846                     {
00847                         pchan->ikflag = pchanact->ikflag;
00848                         copy_v3_v3(pchan->limitmin, pchanact->limitmin);
00849                         copy_v3_v3(pchan->limitmax, pchanact->limitmax);
00850                         copy_v3_v3(pchan->stiffness, pchanact->stiffness);
00851                         pchan->ikstretch= pchanact->ikstretch;
00852                         pchan->ikrotweight= pchanact->ikrotweight;
00853                         pchan->iklinweight= pchanact->iklinweight;
00854                     }
00855                         break;
00856                     case 8: /* Custom Bone Shape */
00857                         pchan->custom = pchanact->custom;
00858                         break;
00859                     case 9: /* Visual Location */
00860                         armature_loc_pose_to_bone(pchan, pchanact->pose_mat[3], pchan->loc);
00861                         break;
00862                     case 10: /* Visual Rotation */
00863                     {
00864                         float delta_mat[4][4];
00865                         
00866                         armature_mat_pose_to_bone(pchan, pchanact->pose_mat, delta_mat);
00867                         
00868                         if (pchan->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE) {
00869                             float tmp_quat[4];
00870                             
00871                             /* need to convert to quat first (in temp var)... */
00872                             mat4_to_quat( tmp_quat,delta_mat);
00873                             quat_to_axis_angle( pchan->rotAxis, &pchan->rotAngle,tmp_quat);
00874                         }
00875                         else if (pchan->rotmode == ROT_MODE_QUAT)
00876                             mat4_to_quat( pchan->quat,delta_mat);
00877                         else
00878                             mat4_to_eulO( pchan->eul, pchan->rotmode,delta_mat);
00879                     }
00880                         break;
00881                     case 11: /* Visual Size */
00882                     {
00883                         float delta_mat[4][4], size[4];
00884                         
00885                         armature_mat_pose_to_bone(pchan, pchanact->pose_mat, delta_mat);
00886                         mat4_to_size( size,delta_mat);
00887                         copy_v3_v3(pchan->size, size);
00888                     }
00889                 }
00890             }
00891         }
00892     } 
00893     else { /* constraints, optional (note: max we can have is 24 constraints) */
00894         bConstraint *con, *con_back;
00895         int const_toggle[24]= {0}; /* XXX, initialize as 0 to quiet errors */
00896         ListBase const_copy = {NULL, NULL};
00897         
00898         BLI_duplicatelist(&const_copy, &(pchanact->constraints));
00899         
00900         /* build the puplist of constraints */
00901         for (con = pchanact->constraints.first, i=0; con; con=con->next, i++) {
00902             const_toggle[i]= 1;
00903 //          add_numbut(i, TOG|INT, con->name, 0, 0, &(const_toggle[i]), "");
00904         }
00905         
00906 //      if (!do_clever_numbuts("Select Constraints", i, REDRAW)) {
00907 //          BLI_freelistN(&const_copy);
00908 //          return;
00909 //      }
00910         
00911         /* now build a new listbase from the options selected */
00912         for (i=0, con=const_copy.first; con; i++) {
00913             /* if not selected, free/remove it from the list */
00914             if (!const_toggle[i]) {
00915                 con_back= con->next;
00916                 BLI_freelinkN(&const_copy, con);
00917                 con= con_back;
00918             } 
00919             else
00920                 con= con->next;
00921         }
00922         
00923         /* Copy the temo listbase to the selected posebones */
00924         for (pchan= ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
00925             if ( (arm->layer & pchan->bone->layer) &&
00926                  (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) &&
00927                  (pchan!=pchanact) ) 
00928             {
00929                 ListBase tmp_constraints = {NULL, NULL};
00930                 
00931                 /* copy constraints to tmpbase and apply 'local' tags before 
00932                  * appending to list of constraints for this channel
00933                  */
00934                 copy_constraints(&tmp_constraints, &const_copy, TRUE);
00935                 if ((ob->proxy) && (pchan->bone->layer & arm->layer_protected)) {                   
00936                     /* add proxy-local tags */
00937                     for (con= tmp_constraints.first; con; con= con->next)
00938                         con->flag |= CONSTRAINT_PROXY_LOCAL;
00939                 }
00940                 BLI_movelisttolist(&pchan->constraints, &tmp_constraints);
00941                 
00942                 /* update flags (need to add here, not just copy) */
00943                 pchan->constflag |= pchanact->constflag;
00944             }
00945         }
00946         BLI_freelistN(&const_copy);
00947         update_pose_constraint_flags(ob->pose); /* we could work out the flags but its simpler to do this */
00948         
00949         if (ob->pose)
00950             ob->pose->flag |= POSE_RECALC;
00951     }
00952     
00953     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA); // and all its relations
00954     
00955     BIF_undo_push("Copy Pose Attributes");
00956     
00957 }
00958 #endif
00959 
00960 /* ******************** copy/paste pose ********************** */
00961 
00962 /* Global copy/paste buffer for pose - cleared on start/end session + before every copy operation */
00963 static bPose *g_posebuf = NULL;
00964 
00965 void free_posebuf(void) 
00966 {
00967     if (g_posebuf) {
00968         bPoseChannel *pchan;
00969         
00970         for (pchan= g_posebuf->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
00971             if (pchan->prop) {
00972                 IDP_FreeProperty(pchan->prop);
00973                 MEM_freeN(pchan->prop);
00974             }
00975         }
00976         
00977         /* was copied without constraints */
00978         BLI_freelistN(&g_posebuf->chanbase);
00979         MEM_freeN(g_posebuf);
00980     }
00981     
00982     g_posebuf=NULL;
00983 }
00984 
00985 /* This function is used to indicate that a bone is selected 
00986  * and needs to be included in copy buffer (used to be for inserting keys)
00987  */
00988 static void set_pose_keys (Object *ob)
00989 {
00990     bArmature *arm= ob->data;
00991     bPoseChannel *chan;
00992 
00993     if (ob->pose) {
00994         for (chan=ob->pose->chanbase.first; chan; chan=chan->next) {
00995             Bone *bone= chan->bone;
00996             if ((bone) && (bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) && (arm->layer & bone->layer))
00997                 chan->flag |= POSE_KEY; 
00998             else
00999                 chan->flag &= ~POSE_KEY;
01000         }
01001     }
01002 }
01003 
01004 /* perform paste pose, for a single bone 
01005  * < ob: object where bone to paste to lives
01006  * < chan: bone that pose to paste comes from
01007  * < selOnly: only paste on selected bones
01008  * < flip: flip on x-axis
01009  *
01010  * > returns: whether the bone that we pasted to if we succeeded
01011  */
01012 static bPoseChannel *pose_bone_do_paste (Object *ob, bPoseChannel *chan, short selOnly, short flip)
01013 {
01014     bPoseChannel *pchan;
01015     char name[MAXBONENAME];
01016     short paste_ok;
01017     
01018     /* get the name - if flipping, we must flip this first */
01019     if (flip)
01020         flip_side_name(name, chan->name, 0);        /* 0 = don't strip off number extensions */
01021     else
01022         BLI_strncpy(name, chan->name, sizeof(name));
01023     
01024     /* only copy when:
01025      *  1) channel exists - poses are not meant to add random channels to anymore
01026      *  2) if selection-masking is on, channel is selected - only selected bones get pasted on, allowing making both sides symmetrical
01027      */
01028     pchan= get_pose_channel(ob->pose, name);
01029     
01030     if (selOnly)
01031         paste_ok= ((pchan) && (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED));
01032     else
01033         paste_ok= ((pchan != NULL));
01034     
01035     /* continue? */
01036     if (paste_ok) {
01037         /* only loc rot size 
01038          *  - only copies transform info for the pose 
01039          */
01040         copy_v3_v3(pchan->loc, chan->loc);
01041         copy_v3_v3(pchan->size, chan->size);
01042         pchan->flag= chan->flag;
01043         
01044         /* check if rotation modes are compatible (i.e. do they need any conversions) */
01045         if (pchan->rotmode == chan->rotmode) {
01046             /* copy the type of rotation in use */
01047             if (pchan->rotmode > 0) {
01048                 copy_v3_v3(pchan->eul, chan->eul);
01049             }
01050             else if (pchan->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE) {
01051                 copy_v3_v3(pchan->rotAxis, chan->rotAxis);
01052                 pchan->rotAngle = chan->rotAngle;
01053             }
01054             else {
01055                 copy_qt_qt(pchan->quat, chan->quat);
01056             }
01057         }
01058         else if (pchan->rotmode > 0) {
01059             /* quat/axis-angle to euler */
01060             if (chan->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE)
01061                 axis_angle_to_eulO( pchan->eul, pchan->rotmode,chan->rotAxis, chan->rotAngle);
01062             else
01063                 quat_to_eulO( pchan->eul, pchan->rotmode,chan->quat);
01064         }
01065         else if (pchan->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE) {
01066             /* quat/euler to axis angle */
01067             if (chan->rotmode > 0)
01068                 eulO_to_axis_angle(pchan->rotAxis, &pchan->rotAngle, chan->eul, chan->rotmode);
01069             else    
01070                 quat_to_axis_angle(pchan->rotAxis, &pchan->rotAngle, chan->quat);
01071         }
01072         else {
01073             /* euler/axis-angle to quat */
01074             if (chan->rotmode > 0)
01075                 eulO_to_quat(pchan->quat, chan->eul, chan->rotmode);
01076             else
01077                 axis_angle_to_quat(pchan->quat, chan->rotAxis, pchan->rotAngle);
01078         }
01079         
01080         /* paste flipped pose? */
01081         if (flip) {
01082             pchan->loc[0]*= -1;
01083             
01084             /* has to be done as eulers... */
01085             if (pchan->rotmode > 0) {
01086                 pchan->eul[1] *= -1;
01087                 pchan->eul[2] *= -1;
01088             }
01089             else if (pchan->rotmode == ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE) {
01090                 float eul[3];
01091                 
01092                 axis_angle_to_eulO(eul, EULER_ORDER_DEFAULT, pchan->rotAxis, pchan->rotAngle);
01093                 eul[1]*= -1;
01094                 eul[2]*= -1;
01095                 eulO_to_axis_angle(pchan->rotAxis, &pchan->rotAngle, eul, EULER_ORDER_DEFAULT);
01096             }
01097             else {
01098                 float eul[3];
01099                 
01100                 normalize_qt(pchan->quat);
01101                 quat_to_eul(eul, pchan->quat);
01102                 eul[1]*= -1;
01103                 eul[2]*= -1;
01104                 eul_to_quat(pchan->quat, eul);
01105             }
01106         }
01107         
01108         /* ID properties */
01109         if (chan->prop) {
01110             if (pchan->prop) {
01111                 /* if we have existing properties on a bone, just copy over the values of 
01112                  * matching properties (i.e. ones which will have some impact) on to the 
01113                  * target instead of just blinding replacing all [
01114                  */
01115                 IDP_SyncGroupValues(pchan->prop, chan->prop);
01116             }
01117             else {
01118                 /* no existing properties, so assume that we want copies too? */
01119                 pchan->prop= IDP_CopyProperty(chan->prop);  
01120             }
01121         }
01122     }
01123     
01124     /* return whether paste went ahead */
01125     return pchan;
01126 }
01127 
01128 /* ---- */
01129 
01130 static int pose_copy_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01131 {
01132     Object *ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
01133     
01134     /* sanity checking */
01135     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->pose)) {
01136         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "No Pose to Copy");
01137         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01138     }
01139 
01140     /* free existing pose buffer */
01141     free_posebuf();
01142     
01143     /* sets chan->flag to POSE_KEY if bone selected, then copy those bones to the buffer */
01144     set_pose_keys(ob);  
01145     copy_pose(&g_posebuf, ob->pose, 0);
01146     
01147     
01148     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01149 }
01150 
01151 void POSE_OT_copy (wmOperatorType *ot) 
01152 {
01153     /* identifiers */
01154     ot->name = "Copy Pose";
01155     ot->idname = "POSE_OT_copy";
01156     ot->description = "Copies the current pose of the selected bones to copy/paste buffer";
01157     
01158     /* api callbacks */
01159     ot->exec = pose_copy_exec;
01160     ot->poll = ED_operator_posemode;
01161     
01162     /* flag */
01163     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER;
01164 }
01165 
01166 /* ---- */
01167 
01168 static int pose_paste_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01169 {
01170     Object *ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
01171     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01172     bPoseChannel *chan;
01173     int flip= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "flipped");
01174     int selOnly= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "selected_mask");
01175 
01176     /* get KeyingSet to use */
01177     KeyingSet *ks = ANIM_get_keyingset_for_autokeying(scene, ANIM_KS_LOC_ROT_SCALE_ID);
01178 
01179     /* sanity checks */
01180     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->pose))
01181         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01182 
01183     if (g_posebuf == NULL) {
01184         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Copy buffer is empty");
01185         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01186     }
01187     
01188     /* if selOnly option is enabled, if user hasn't selected any bones, 
01189      * just go back to default behavior to be more in line with other pose tools
01190      */
01191     if (selOnly) {
01192         if (CTX_DATA_COUNT(C, selected_pose_bones) == 0)
01193             selOnly = 0;
01194     }
01195 
01196     /* Safely merge all of the channels in the buffer pose into any existing pose */
01197     for (chan= g_posebuf->chanbase.first; chan; chan=chan->next) {
01198         if (chan->flag & POSE_KEY) {
01199             /* try to perform paste on this bone */
01200             bPoseChannel *pchan = pose_bone_do_paste(ob, chan, selOnly, flip);
01201             
01202             if (pchan) {
01203                 /* keyframing tagging for successful paste */
01204                 ED_autokeyframe_pchan(C, scene, ob, pchan, ks);
01205             }
01206         }
01207     }
01208     
01209     /* Update event for pose and deformation children */
01210     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
01211         
01212     /* notifiers for updates */
01213     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
01214 
01215     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01216 }
01217

01221 
01222     /* identifiers */

01224     ot->idname = "POSE_OT_paste";

01260     pose_add_group(ob);

01323 /* ------------ */
01324 
01325 /* invoke callback which presents a list of bone-groups for the user to choose from */
01326 static int pose_groups_menu_invoke (bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(evt))
01327 {
01328     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
01329     Object *ob;
01330     bPose *pose;
01331     
01332     uiPopupMenu *pup;
01333     uiLayout *layout;
01334     bActionGroup *grp;
01335     int i;
01336     
01337     /* since this call may also be used from the buttons window, we need to check for where to get the object */
01338     if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_BUTS) 
01339         ob= ED_object_context(C);
01340     else
01341         ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
01342     
01343     /* only continue if there's an object, and a pose there too */
01344     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->pose)) 
01345         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01346     pose= ob->pose;
01347     
01348     /* if there's no active group (or active is invalid), create a new menu to find it */
01349     if (pose->active_group <= 0) {
01350         /* create a new menu, and start populating it with group names */
01351         pup= uiPupMenuBegin(C, op->type->name, ICON_NONE);
01352         layout= uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
01353         
01354         /* special entry - allow to create new group, then use that 
01355          *  (not to be used for removing though)
01356          */
01357         if (strstr(op->idname, "assign")) {
01358             uiItemIntO(layout, "New Group", ICON_NONE, op->idname, "type", 0);
01359             uiItemS(layout);
01360         }
01361         
01362         /* add entries for each group */
01363         for (grp= pose->agroups.first, i=1; grp; grp=grp->next, i++)
01364             uiItemIntO(layout, grp->name, ICON_NONE, op->idname, "type", i);
01365             
01366         /* finish building the menu, and process it (should result in calling self again) */
01367         uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
01368         
01369         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01370     }
01371     else {
01372         /* just use the active group index, and call the exec callback for the calling operator */
01373         RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "type", pose->active_group);
01374         return op->type->exec(C, op);
01375     }
01376 }
01377 
01378 /* Assign selected pchans to the bone group that the user selects */
01379 static int pose_group_assign_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01380 {
01381     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
01382     Object *ob;
01383     bPose *pose;
01384     short done= 0;
01385     
01386     /* since this call may also be used from the buttons window, we need to check for where to get the object */
01387     if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_BUTS) 
01388         ob= ED_object_context(C);
01389     else
01390         ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
01391     
01392     /* only continue if there's an object, and a pose there too */
01393     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->pose))
01394         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01395 
01396     pose= ob->pose;
01397     
01398     /* set the active group number to the one from operator props 
01399      *  - if 0 after this, make a new group...
01400      */
01401     pose->active_group= RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "type");
01402     if (pose->active_group == 0)
01403         pose_add_group(ob);
01404     
01405     /* add selected bones to group then */
01406     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel*, pchan, selected_pose_bones)
01407     {
01408         pchan->agrp_index= pose->active_group;
01409         done= 1;
01410     }
01411     CTX_DATA_END;
01412 
01413     /* notifiers for updates */
01414     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
01415     
01416     /* report done status */
01417     if (done)
01418         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01419     else
01420         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01421 }
01422

01425     /* identifiers */

01427     ot->idname = "POSE_OT_group_assign";
01428     ot->description = "Add selected bones to the chosen bone group";
01429     
01430     /* api callbacks */
01431     ot->invoke = pose_groups_menu_invoke;
01432     ot->exec = pose_group_assign_exec;
01433     ot->poll = ED_operator_posemode;
01434     
01435     /* flags */
01436     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01437     
01438     /* properties */
01439     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "type", 0, 0, 10, "Bone Group Index", "", 0, INT_MAX);
01440 }

01443 static int pose_group_unassign_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01444 {
01445     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
01446     Object *ob;
01447     short done= 0;
01448     
01449     /* since this call may also be used from the buttons window, we need to check for where to get the object */
01450     if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_BUTS) 
01451         ob= ED_object_context(C);
01452     else
01453         ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
01454     
01455     /* only continue if there's an object, and a pose there too */
01456     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->pose))
01457         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01458     
01459     /* find selected bones to remove from all bone groups */
01460     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel*, pchan, selected_pose_bones)
01461     {

01463             pchan->agrp_index= 0;
01464             done= 1;
01465         }
01466     }
01467     CTX_DATA_END;
01468     
01469     /* notifiers for updates */
01470     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
01471     
01472     /* report done status */
01473     if (done)
01474         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01475     else
01476         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01477 }

01485

01493 
01494 static int group_move_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01495 {
01496     Object *ob = ED_object_context(C);
01497     bPose *pose= (ob) ? ob->pose : NULL;
01498     bPoseChannel *pchan;
01499     bActionGroup *grp;
01500     int dir= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "direction");
01501     int grpIndexA, grpIndexB;
01502 
01503     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, pose))
01504         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01505     if (pose->active_group <= 0)
01506         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01507 
01508     /* get group to move */
01509     grp= BLI_findlink(&pose->agroups, pose->active_group-1);
01510     if (grp == NULL)
01511         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01512 
01513     /* move bone group */
01514     grpIndexA = pose->active_group;
01515     if (dir == 1) { /* up */
01516         void *prev = grp->prev;
01517         
01518         if (prev == NULL)
01519             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01520             
01521         BLI_remlink(&pose->agroups, grp);
01522         BLI_insertlinkbefore(&pose->agroups, prev, grp);
01523         
01524         grpIndexB = grpIndexA - 1;
01525         pose->active_group--;
01526     }
01527     else { /* down */
01528         void *next = grp->next;
01529         
01530         if (next == NULL)
01531             return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01532             
01533         BLI_remlink(&pose->agroups, grp);
01534         BLI_insertlinkafter(&pose->agroups, next, grp);
01535         
01536         grpIndexB = grpIndexA + 1;
01537         pose->active_group++;
01538     }
01539 
01540     /* fix changed bone group indices in bones (swap grpIndexA with grpIndexB) */
01541     for (pchan= ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
01542         if (pchan->agrp_index == grpIndexB)
01543             pchan->agrp_index= grpIndexA;
01544         else if (pchan->agrp_index == grpIndexA)
01545             pchan->agrp_index= grpIndexB;
01546     }
01547 
01548     /* notifiers for updates */
01549     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
01550 
01551     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01552 }
01553 
01554 void POSE_OT_group_move(wmOperatorType *ot)
01555 {
01556     static EnumPropertyItem group_slot_move[] = {
01557         {1, "UP", 0, "Up", ""},
01558         {-1, "DOWN", 0, "Down", ""},
01559         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
01560     };
01561 
01562     /* identifiers */
01563     ot->name = "Move Bone Group";
01564     ot->idname = "POSE_OT_group_move";
01565     ot->description = "Change position of active Bone Group in list of Bone Groups";
01566 
01567     /* api callbacks */
01568     ot->exec = group_move_exec;
01569     ot->poll = ED_operator_posemode;
01570 
01571     /* flags */
01572     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01573 
01574     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "direction", group_slot_move, 0, "Direction", "Direction to move, UP or DOWN");
01575 }
01576 
01577 /* bone group sort element */
01578 typedef struct tSortActionGroup {
01579     bActionGroup *agrp;
01580     int          index;
01581 } tSortActionGroup;
01582 
01583 /* compare bone groups by name */
01584 static int compare_agroup(const void *sgrp_a_ptr, const void *sgrp_b_ptr)
01585 {
01586     tSortActionGroup *sgrp_a= (tSortActionGroup *)sgrp_a_ptr;
01587     tSortActionGroup *sgrp_b= (tSortActionGroup *)sgrp_b_ptr;
01588 
01589     return strcmp(sgrp_a->agrp->name, sgrp_b->agrp->name);
01590 }
01591 
01592 static int group_sort_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01593 {
01594     Object *ob = ED_object_context(C);
01595     bPose *pose= (ob) ? ob->pose : NULL;
01596     bPoseChannel *pchan;
01597     tSortActionGroup *agrp_array;
01598     bActionGroup *agrp;
01599     int agrp_count;
01600     int i;
01601 
01602     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, pose))
01603         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01604     if (pose->active_group <= 0)
01605         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01606 
01607     /* create temporary array with bone groups and indices */
01608     agrp_count = BLI_countlist(&pose->agroups);
01609     agrp_array = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(tSortActionGroup) * agrp_count, "sort bone groups");
01610     for (agrp= pose->agroups.first, i= 0; agrp; agrp= agrp->next, i++) {
01611         BLI_assert(i < agrp_count);
01612         agrp_array[i].agrp = agrp;
01613         agrp_array[i].index = i+1;
01614     }
01615 
01616     /* sort bone groups by name */
01617     qsort(agrp_array, agrp_count, sizeof(tSortActionGroup), compare_agroup);
01618 
01619     /* create sorted bone group list from sorted array */
01620     pose->agroups.first= pose->agroups.last= NULL;
01621     for (i= 0; i < agrp_count; i++) {
01622         BLI_addtail(&pose->agroups, agrp_array[i].agrp);
01623     }
01624 
01625     /* fix changed bone group indizes in bones */
01626     for (pchan= ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
01627         for (i= 0; i < agrp_count; i++) {
01628             if (pchan->agrp_index == agrp_array[i].index) {
01629                 pchan->agrp_index= i+1;
01630                 break;
01631             }
01632         }
01633     }
01634 
01635     /* free temp resources */
01636     MEM_freeN(agrp_array);
01637 
01638     /* notifiers for updates */
01639     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
01640 
01641     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01642 }
01643 
01644 void POSE_OT_group_sort(wmOperatorType *ot)
01645 {
01646     /* identifiers */
01647     ot->name = "Sort Bone Groups";
01648     ot->idname = "POSE_OT_group_sort";
01649     ot->description = "Sort Bone Groups by their names in ascending order";
01650 
01651     /* api callbacks */
01652     ot->exec = group_sort_exec;
01653     ot->poll = ED_operator_posemode;
01654 
01655     /* flags */
01656     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01657 }
01658 
01659 static void pose_group_select(bContext *C, Object *ob, int select)
01660 {
01661     bPose *pose= ob->pose;
01662     
01663     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel*, pchan, visible_pose_bones)
01664     {
01665         if ((pchan->bone->flag & BONE_UNSELECTABLE)==0) {
01666             if (select) {
01667                 if (pchan->agrp_index == pose->active_group) 
01668                     pchan->bone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
01669             }
01670             else {
01671                 if (pchan->agrp_index == pose->active_group) 
01672                     pchan->bone->flag &= ~BONE_SELECTED;
01673             }
01674         }
01675     }
01676     CTX_DATA_END;
01677 }
01678 
01679 static int pose_group_select_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01680 {
01681     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
01682     Object *ob;
01683     
01684     /* since this call may also be used from the buttons window, we need to check for where to get the object */
01685     if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_BUTS) 
01686         ob= ED_object_context(C);
01687     else
01688         ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
01689     
01690     /* only continue if there's an object, and a pose there too */
01691     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->pose))
01692         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01693     
01694     pose_group_select(C, ob, 1);
01695     
01696     /* notifiers for updates */
01697     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
01698     
01699     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01700 }

01755 /* ********************************************** */
01756 
01757 static int pose_flip_names_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01758 {
01759     Object *ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
01760     bArmature *arm;
01761     
01762     /* paranoia checks */
01763     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->pose)) 
01764         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01765     arm= ob->data;
01766     
01767     /* loop through selected bones, auto-naming them */
01768     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel*, pchan, selected_pose_bones)
01769     {
01770         char newname[MAXBONENAME];
01771         flip_side_name(newname, pchan->name, TRUE);
01772         ED_armature_bone_rename(arm, pchan->name, newname);
01773     }
01774     CTX_DATA_END;
01775     
01776     /* since we renamed stuff... */
01777     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
01778 
01779     /* note, notifier might evolve */
01780     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
01781     
01782     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01783 }
01784 
01785 void POSE_OT_flip_names (wmOperatorType *ot)
01786 {
01787     /* identifiers */
01788     ot->name = "Flip Names";
01789     ot->idname = "POSE_OT_flip_names";
01790     ot->description = "Flips (and corrects) the axis suffixes of the the names of selected bones";
01791     
01792     /* api callbacks */
01793     ot->exec = pose_flip_names_exec;
01794     ot->poll = ED_operator_posemode;
01795     
01796     /* flags */
01797     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01798 }
01799 
01800 /* ------------------ */
01801 
01802 static int pose_autoside_names_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01803 {
01804     Object *ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
01805     bArmature *arm;
01806     char newname[MAXBONENAME];
01807     short axis= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "axis");
01808     
01809     /* paranoia checks */
01810     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->pose)) 
01811         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01812     arm= ob->data;
01813     
01814     /* loop through selected bones, auto-naming them */
01815     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel*, pchan, selected_pose_bones)
01816     {
01817         BLI_strncpy(newname, pchan->name, sizeof(newname));
01818         if (bone_autoside_name(newname, 1, axis, pchan->bone->head[axis], pchan->bone->tail[axis]))
01819             ED_armature_bone_rename(arm, pchan->name, newname);
01820     }
01821     CTX_DATA_END;
01822     
01823     /* since we renamed stuff... */
01824     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
01825 
01826     /* note, notifier might evolve */
01827     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
01828

01899 /* Show all armature layers */
01900 static int pose_armature_layers_showall_poll (bContext *C)
01901 {
01902     /* this single operator can be used in posemode OR editmode for armatures */
01903     return ED_operator_posemode(C) || ED_operator_editarmature(C);
01904 }
01905 
01906 static int pose_armature_layers_showall_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01907 {
01908     Object *ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
01909     bArmature *arm = (ob)? ob->data : NULL;
01910     PointerRNA ptr;
01911     int maxLayers = (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "all"))? 32 : 16;
01912     int layers[32] = {0}; /* hardcoded for now - we can only have 32 armature layers, so this should be fine... */
01913     int i;
01914     
01915     /* sanity checking */
01916     if (arm == NULL)
01917         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01918     
01919     /* use RNA to set the layers
01920      *  although it would be faster to just set directly using bitflags, we still
01921      *  need to setup a RNA pointer so that we get the "update" callbacks for free...
01922      */
01923     RNA_id_pointer_create(&arm->id, &ptr);
01924     
01925     for (i = 0; i < maxLayers; i++)
01926         layers[i] = 1;
01927     
01928     RNA_boolean_set_array(&ptr, "layers", layers);
01929     
01930     /* note, notifier might evolve */
01931     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
01932     
01933     /* done */
01934     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01935 }

01941     ot->idname = "ARMATURE_OT_layers_show_all";
01942     ot->description = "Make all armature layers visible";
01943     
01944     /* callbacks */
01945     ot->exec = pose_armature_layers_showall_exec;
01946     ot->poll = pose_armature_layers_showall_poll;
01947     
01948     /* flags */
01949     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01950     
01951     /* properties */
01952     ot->prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "all", 1, "All Layers", "Enable all layers or just the first 16 (top row)");
01953 }

01955 /* ------------------- */
01956 
01957 /* Present a popup to get the layers that should be used */
01958 static int pose_armature_layers_invoke (bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
01959 {
01960     Object *ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
01961     bArmature *arm= (ob)? ob->data : NULL;
01962     PointerRNA ptr;
01963     int layers[32]; /* hardcoded for now - we can only have 32 armature layers, so this should be fine... */
01964     
01965     /* sanity checking */
01966     if (arm == NULL)
01967         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01968         
01969     /* get RNA pointer to armature data to use that to retrieve the layers as ints to init the operator */
01970     RNA_id_pointer_create((ID *)arm, &ptr);
01971     RNA_boolean_get_array(&ptr, "layers", layers);
01972     RNA_boolean_set_array(op->ptr, "layers", layers);
01973     
01974     /* part to sync with other similar operators... */
01975     return WM_operator_props_popup(C, op, evt);
01976 }
01977 
01978 /* Set the visible layers for the active armature (edit and pose modes) */
01979 static int pose_armature_layers_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01980 {
01981     Object *ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
01982     PointerRNA ptr;
01983     int layers[32]; /* hardcoded for now - we can only have 32 armature layers, so this should be fine... */
01984 
01985     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, ob->data)) {
01986         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01987     }
01988 
01989     /* get the values set in the operator properties */
01990     RNA_boolean_get_array(op->ptr, "layers", layers);
01991 
01992     /* get pointer for armature, and write data there... */
01993     RNA_id_pointer_create((ID *)ob->data, &ptr);
01994     RNA_boolean_set_array(&ptr, "layers", layers);
01995 
01996     /* note, notifier might evolve */
01997     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
01998 
01999     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02000 }

02040 
02041 /* ------------------- */
02042 
02043 /* Present a popup to get the layers that should be used */
02044 static int pose_bone_layers_invoke (bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
02045 {
02046     int layers[32]= {0}; /* hardcoded for now - we can only have 32 armature layers, so this should be fine... */
02047     
02048     /* get layers that are active already */    
02049     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel *, pchan, selected_pose_bones) 
02050     {
02051         short bit;
02052         
02053         /* loop over the bits for this pchan's layers, adding layers where they're needed */
02054         for (bit= 0; bit < 32; bit++) {
02055             if (pchan->bone->layer & (1<<bit))
02056                 layers[bit]= 1;
02057         }
02058     }
02059     CTX_DATA_END;
02060     
02061     /* copy layers to operator */
02062     RNA_boolean_set_array(op->ptr, "layers", layers);
02063     
02064         /* part to sync with other similar operators... */
02065     return WM_operator_props_popup(C, op, evt);
02066 }
02067 
02068 /* Set the visible layers for the active armature (edit and pose modes) */
02069 static int pose_bone_layers_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02070 {
02071     Object *ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
02072     PointerRNA ptr;
02073     int layers[32]; /* hardcoded for now - we can only have 32 armature layers, so this should be fine... */
02074 
02075     if (ob==NULL || ob->data==NULL) {
02076         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02077     }
02078 
02079     /* get the values set in the operator properties */
02080     RNA_boolean_get_array(op->ptr, "layers", layers);
02081 
02082     /* set layers of pchans based on the values set in the operator props */
02083     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel *, pchan, selected_pose_bones)
02084     {
02085         /* get pointer for pchan, and write flags this way */
02086         RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob->data, &RNA_Bone, pchan->bone, &ptr);
02087         RNA_boolean_set_array(&ptr, "layers", layers);
02088     }
02089     CTX_DATA_END;
02090 
02091     /* note, notifier might evolve */
02092     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_POSE, ob);
02093 
02094     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02095 }

02120 {
02121     int layers[32]= {0}; /* hardcoded for now - we can only have 32 armature layers, so this should be fine... */
02122     
02123     /* get layers that are active already */
02124     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, EditBone *, ebone, selected_editable_bones)

02127         
02128         /* loop over the bits for this pchan's layers, adding layers where they're needed */
02129         for (bit= 0; bit < 32; bit++) {
02130             if (ebone->layer & (1<<bit))

02132         }

02188 /* ********************************************** */
02189 /* Flip Quats */
02190 
02191 static int pose_flip_quats_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02192 {
02193     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
02194     Object *ob= object_pose_armature_get(CTX_data_active_object(C));
02195     KeyingSet *ks = ANIM_builtin_keyingset_get_named(NULL, ANIM_KS_LOC_ROT_SCALE_ID);
02196     
02197     /* loop through all selected pchans, flipping and keying (as needed) */
02198     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, bPoseChannel*, pchan, selected_pose_bones)
02199     {
02200         /* only if bone is using quaternion rotation */
02201         if (pchan->rotmode == ROT_MODE_QUAT) {
02202             /* quaternions have 720 degree range */
02203             negate_v4(pchan->quat);
02204 
02205             ED_autokeyframe_pchan(C, scene, ob, pchan, ks);
02206         }
02207     }
02208     CTX_DATA_END;
02209     
02210     /* notifiers and updates */
02211     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02212     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, ob);
02213     
02214     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02215 }

02223

02227     
02228     /* flags */
02229     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;

02231 
02232 /* ********************************************** */
02233 /* Clear User Transforms */
02234 
02235 static int pose_clear_user_transforms_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02236 {
02237     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02238     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
02239     float cframe = (float)CFRA;
02240     
02241     if ((ob->adt) && (ob->adt->action)) {
02242         /* XXX: this is just like this to avoid contaminating anything else; 
02243          * just pose values should change, so this should be fine 
02244          */
02245         bPose *dummyPose = NULL;
02246         Object workob = {{0}}; 
02247         bPoseChannel *pchan;
02248         
02249         /* execute animation step for current frame using a dummy copy of the pose */       
02250         copy_pose(&dummyPose, ob->pose, 0);
02251         
02252         BLI_strncpy(workob.id.name, "OB<ClearTfmWorkOb>", sizeof(workob.id.name));
02253         workob.type = OB_ARMATURE;
02254         workob.data = ob->data;
02255         workob.adt = ob->adt;
02256         workob.pose = dummyPose;
02257         
02258         BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(scene, &workob.id, workob.adt, cframe, ADT_RECALC_ANIM);
02259         
02260         /* copy back values, but on selected bones only  */
02261         for (pchan = dummyPose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
02262             pose_bone_do_paste(ob, pchan, 1, 0);
02263         }
02264         
02265         /* free temp data - free manually as was copied without constraints */
02266         if (dummyPose) {
02267             for (pchan= dummyPose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan= pchan->next) {
02268                 if (pchan->prop) {
02269                     IDP_FreeProperty(pchan->prop);
02270                     MEM_freeN(pchan->prop);
02271                 }
02272             }
02273             
02274             /* was copied without constraints */
02275             BLI_freelistN(&dummyPose->chanbase);
02276             MEM_freeN(dummyPose);
02277         }
02278     }
02279     else {
02280         /* no animation, so just reset whole pose to rest pose 
02281          * (cannot just restore for selected though)
02282          */
02283         rest_pose(ob->pose);
02284     }
02285     
02286     /* notifiers and updates */
02287     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02288     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, ob);
02289     
02290     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02291 }
02292 
02293 void POSE_OT_user_transforms_clear (wmOperatorType *ot)
02294 {
02295     /* identifiers */
02296     ot->name = "Clear User Transforms";
02297     ot->idname = "POSE_OT_user_transforms_clear";
02298     ot->description = "Reset pose on selected bones to keyframed state";
02299     
02300     /* callbacks */
02301     ot->exec = pose_clear_user_transforms_exec;
02302     ot->poll = ED_operator_posemode;
02303     
02304     /* flags */
02305     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02306 }
